title: Ffood
typeOfFood: Lacto, American, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A smoothie/juice bar and sandwich shop with vegan choices that are not clearly labeled, so please ask. All juices are made-to-order using fresh ingredients. A vegetarian sandwich on the menu can easily be made vegan. All bread is vegan (regular sandwich or rye bread). Does not have a separate working station for vegan food. Seating is very limited.
